disobedience.description: Rejecting Church unity due to frustration with individuals is sinful because it confuses the Church's divine nature and eternal truths with the human imperfections of its members, while also violating Christ's prayer "that they may all be one."

disobedience.question: Did I intentionally neglect to fulfill my spiritual obligation on days designated for fasting?

condoning.question: Did I condone a funeral where human remains were not given proper burial?

ambition.question: Did I let my desire for power and dominance influence how I relate to others through my online presence, interactions, and relationships?
ambition.description: inordinate ambition and the obsession with power corrupts the soul by placing our desire to dominate and control above God's authority, turning us away from humble service and toward prideful self-exaltation.

greed.question: Have I made accumulation of money and possessions an idol that drives my life?
greed.description: This sin makes money an idol that replaces trust in God's providence, turning what should be a tool for good into an object of worship.

extracted_data_phrases: into idols that replace trust in God 's providence
greed.question: Have I made accumulating money and possessions a driving force in my life, turning them into idols that replace trust in God's providence?
greed.description: This sin makes money an idol that replaces trust in God's providence, turning what should be a tool for good into an object of worship.

oppression.question: Have I mistreated, harassed, or discriminated against others through my actions or deeds?
oppression.description: It's a sin to execute an unjust and cruel exercise of power or authority over others instead of respecting the God-given dignity of every human person.

extracted_data_phrases: through my actions , words , or attitude
oppression.question: Did I, through my actions, words, or attitude, mistreat others?
oppression.description: It's a sin to execute an unjust and cruel exercise of power or authority over others instead of respecting the God-given dignity of every human person.

of their utility , usefulness , or potential
rather than seeing them as fully human beings created in God 's image
as fully human beings created in God 's image
lust.question: Did I view others solely in terms of their utility, usefulness, or potential to benefit me, rather than seeing them as fully human beings created in God's image?
lust.description: While not sexual in nature, this sin is still a form of lust in that it objectifies others who are created in God's image and possesses inherent dignity,

extracted_data_phrases: rather than seeing them as full members of the human family created in God 's image
as full members of the human family created in God 's image
of the human family created in God 's image
lust.question: Have I reduced others to their usefulness or appearance in my thoughts, rather than seeing them as full members of the human family created in God's image?
lust.description: While not sexual in nature, this sin is still a form of lust in that it objectifies others who are created in God's image and possesses inherent dignity,

autonomy.question: Did you take for granted the blessings in your life, forgetting to acknowledge their source in God's providence?
autonomy.description: Believing that one's blessings are due to one's own self-sufficiency and determination is a sin as it is a rejection of recognizing Divine Providence as being ultimately responsible.

extracted_data_phrases: solely to my own abilities , talents , and efforts
autonomy.question: Did I attribute my success, good fortune, and positive experiences in life solely to my own abilities, talents, and efforts, forgetting that God's providence has a role in guiding me towards them?
autonomy.description: Believing that one's blessings are due to one's own self-sufficiency and determination is a sin as it is a rejection of recognizing Divine Providence as being ultimately responsible.

envy.question: Have I felt envy towards others' accomplishments and secretly wished they would be less successful?
envy.description: Envy leads us to have discontent for another's possessions so we won't feel the pain of comparison or perceived lack in our own lives.

extracted_data_phrases: in order to make me feel more accomplished
envy.question: Have I secretly wished that others' accomplishments and successes would diminish in order to make me feel more accomplished?
envy.description: Envy leads us to have discontent for another's possessions so we won't feel the pain of comparison or perceived lack in our own lives.

extracted_data_phrases: in using words that were vulgar or inappropriate to others
incontinence.question: Did you lack self-control in using words that were vulgar or inappropriate to others?
incontinence.description: This sin of incontinence shows a lack of self-restraint and violates the dignity of others.

extracted_data_phrases: with words that were vile or unbecoming
incontinence.question: Did you lack self-control in your online interactions, speaking to others with words that were vile or unbecoming?
incontinence.description: This sin of incontinence shows a lack of self-restraint and violates the dignity of others.

extracted_data_phrases: in eating or drinking beyond what 's reasonable
to excess and lack of self - control
gluttony.question: Did I overindulge in eating or drinking beyond what's reasonable, leading to excess and lack of self-control?
gluttony.description: This sin of gluttony demonstrates an inordinate attachment to worldly pleasures and rejects the call to temperance.

extracted_data_phrases: in eating or drinking beyond what 's reasonable
especially during social gatherings or events where excessive consumption is often encouraged

gluttony.description: This sin of gluttony demonstrates an inordinate attachment to worldly pleasures and rejects the call to temperance.

in activities that prioritize experiences over material possessions
gluttony.question: Did I overindulge in eating or drinking beyond what's reasonable while engaging in activities that prioritize experiences over material possessions?
gluttony.description: This sin of gluttony demonstrates an inordinate attachment to worldly pleasures and rejects the call to temperance.

extracted_data_phrases: in a way that prioritizes excessive and wasteful gambling over my financial obligations or family needs
over my financial obligations or family needs
prodigality.question: Have I used my resources in a way that prioritizes excessive and wasteful gambling over my financial obligations or family needs?
prodigality.description: This sin violates the virtue of stewardship by recklessly risking resources God has entrusted to us, while potentially harming our ability to provide for family and those in need.

prodigality.question: Have I allowed my financial priorities to be overly influenced by wasteful recreational gaming, compromising my ability to meet my essential needs or support others in genuine need?
prodigality.description: This sin violates the virtue of stewardship by recklessly risking resources God has entrusted to us, while potentially harming our ability to provide for family and those in need.

prodigality.question: Have I excessively risked my financial resources for recreational activities, thereby neglecting my responsibilities to provide for myself or support others in need?
prodigality.description: This sin violates the virtue of stewardship by recklessly risking resources God has entrusted to us, while potentially harming our ability to provide for family and those in need.

extracted_data_phrases: in discussing others ' faults or private affairs
perhaps through online forums , group chats , or casual conversations
gossip.question: Have I taken pleasure in discussing others' faults or private affairs, even if what I shared was true, perhaps through online forums, group chats, or casual conversations?
gossip.description: Gossip violates human dignity and charity by harming others' reputations for our own entertainment or pride.

gossip.question: Have I used words to take pleasure in sharing others' private affairs, even if what was shared was true?
gossip.description: Gossip violates human dignity and charity by harming others' reputations for our own entertainment or pride.

extracted_data_phrases: in sharing private details about friends ' or acquaintances ' lives through words
gossip.question: Have I taken pleasure in sharing private details about friends' or acquaintances' lives through words, even if they were true?
gossip.description: Gossip violates human dignity and charity by harming others' reputations for our own entertainment or pride.

impiety.question: Did you use your devices on Sunday when otherwise it could be avoided, thereby disregarding the Lord's Day of rest?
impiety.description: It's irreverent to work on a Sunday as it's a holy day of rest, worship, and a day of protest against the servitude of work and the worship of money (CCC).

impurity.question: Did I use certain practices, substances, or objects that would prevent pregnancy?
impurity.description: This sin intentionally separates the unitive and procreative purposes of marriage and violates the proper use of one's sexuality.

impurity.question: Did I use substances to prevent pregnancy?
impurity.description: This sin intentionally separates the unitive and procreative purposes of marriage and violates the proper use of one's sexuality.
